text: Manilkara multifida is a species of plant in the family Sapotaceae. The plant is endemic to the Atlantic Forest ecoregion in southeastern Brazil. It is an IUCN endangered species, threatened by habitat loss. ==See also== * Pau Brasil National Park — plant is native in the park. ==References== multifida Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Endangered plants Category:Endangered biota of South America Category:Plants described in 1990 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Manilkara multifida
